page.title: 10Where I Live
page.content:
My house is in{Milley Road}in {Waltham St Lawrence}. I live here with my mother, father and my younger sister. The house has a living room, a dining room, a breakfast room and a kitchen downstairs and four bedrooms and a bathroom upstairs. We have just had an{extension}built on our house to make it bigger. We have still got lots of decorating to do.
When we moved into our house the garden was completely wild with grass about five feet high. Now we have a swing and a tree house and there are flower and vegetable patches and a greenhouse for growing things.
I like where I live because there is countryside all round and I can go for nice walks along the{footpaths}.
